data.title: TOMORROW X TOGETHER WORLD TOUR  - EP. 2 - IN MACAU
data.description:
TOMORROW X TOGETHER—consisting of SOOBIN, YEONJUN, BEOMGYU, TAEHYUN, and HUENINGKAI—established themselves as Gen Z Icons through the compelling soundtrack that represents the common experiences and emotions of today’s generation.

TOMORROW X TOGETHER（由崔秀彬、崔然竣、崔杋圭、姜太顯、休寧凱組成）以引人共鳴的音樂作品，成為Z世代代表人物。


In 2024, TOMORROW X TOGETHER became the first K-pop act to perform 2 consecutive sold-out shows in New York’s iconic Madison Square Garden. Their 7th mini album The Star Chapter: SANCTUARY debuted at No. 2 on the Billboard 200, cementing the leading band’s legacy as the second K-pop act ever to amass a total of 11 releases on the chart.

2024年，他們更成為首個在紐約標誌性的麥迪遜廣場花園舉辦兩場連續售罄演出的K-pop團體，并以第七張迷你專輯《The Star Chapter: SANCTUARY》在《Billboard 200》上首週登上第二名，進一步鞏固了這支領先樂隊的地位，成為歷史上第二個在該榜單上累積11張專輯的K-pop團體。


This May 10 and 11, don’t miss your chance to witness the sensation return in person at the Galaxy Arena!

5月10日和11日，千萬不要錯過親身見證TOMORROW X TOGETHER 的舞台魅力，約定你銀河綜藝館見！


演出日期 Date & Time：2025.05.09 (FRI) 8PM & 2025.05.10 (SAT) 7PM & 2025.05.11 (SUN) 4PM

（實際演出時間以現場狀況為準 Actual performance time based on on-site situation）

演出地點 Venue：澳門銀河綜藝館 GALAXY ARENA


MOA MEMBERSHIP PRESALE: 09:00 - 15:00 (CST), February 16th (SUN)

MOA會員預購時間：2025年02月16日（星期日）09:00 - 15:00


General Onsale: February 16th (SUN) at 6PM (CST)

公售時間：2025年02月16日（星期日）18:00


[ADDED] General Onsale: February 24th (MON) at 6PM (CST)

加場公售時間：2025年02月24日（星期一）18:00


Ticket Price 票價

VIP L/ R *STANDING (INCLUDE SOUND CHECK PARTY) MOP 1,999

PLATINUM SEATED MOP 1,999

CAT 1 SEATED MOP 1,799

CAT 2 SEATED MOP 1,499

CAT 3 SEATED MOP 1,199

CAT 4 SEATED MOP 799

RESTRICTED VIEW ZONE



*Each SEATED ticket is assigned a specific seat.

座位區皆為劃位座席，請依票面座位號入座

*STANDING entry is with queue number. For safety reasons, pregnant women and children under 140 cm or 12 years old are not allowed to enter STANDING area.

站區票面有序號，請依票面序號排整隊入場。人身安全起見，孕婦及身高未滿140公分或未滿12歲孩童，請勿購買站區票券，主辦方將有權謝絕入場

*Registration does not guarantee you a ticket. Your MOA MEMBERSHIP NUMBER will be your presale promo code

登記會員並不保證成功購票。您的MOA MEMBERSHIP會員編號即為您的預購碼

*Purchase limit is 4 tickets for MOA MEMBERSHIP PRESALE and 4 tickets per show per account for General Onsale. If more than 4 tickets are purchased with the same member ID after verification, the organizer has the right to cancel the ticket transaction.

MOA MEMBERSHIP會員預購每筆ID限購4張票券，公開售票每人每交易限購4張票券。若經核對發現同一會員ID購票數超過4張，主辦單位有權取消該票券交易。每個優先購票代碼僅可用於每場進行(1筆)交易。一旦参舆任何交易，您的會員資格將無法再次進行驗證或用於其他交易。

*You may be unable to see the entire stage from the Restricted view seats.

Restricted View指視線受阻座位，有機會未能看到完整舞台

*This event uses dynamic electronic tickets. You must log in to your Fantopia account and show the electronic ticket QR code when entering. Paper printouts or screenshots of the electronic ticket QR code will not be accepted for entry.

本次活動採用動態電子門票，入場時需登入 Fantopia 帳戶並出示電子門票二維碼。紙質打印或截圖的電子門票二維碼將無法入場

*Tickets purchased from MOA MEMBERSHIP presale are non-transferable.

會員優先購票不支持轉贈

*We do not offer returns or exchanges.

售出門票不設退換
